TextEng: "Let me see what you have for sale."
"You aren't much of a businessman, are you?"
"You're glad you're poor?"
"I want to ask you some questions."
"That kind of talk might drive away customers."
"I want to make a deal for your mirror shard."
"Never mind."
<StartAction>Bluff</Start> "I've got a cursed gold piece I can give you."
<StartAction>Bluff</Start> "It brings poverty to anyone who freely and knowingly accepts it."
<StartAction>Intimidate</Start> "Give me that shard, or your life will be worth less than a piece of broken glass!"
Text: <StartAction>[위협]</Start> "그 조각 안 주면, 네 목숨은 깨진 유리 조각보다 못한 값어치가 될 거야!"

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade</Start> "But the shard isn't worthless. It's part of a magic mirror."
Text: <StartAction>[설득]</Start> "하지만 그 조각은 쓸모없는 게 아니야. 마법 거울의 일부거든."

TextEng: "I don't have that much."
"Yeah, I think I can afford 1 gold piece."
"You want something worth *less* than the shard?"
"What's worth less than a piece of broken glass?"
Text: "깨진 유리 조각보다 가치가 낮은 게 뭔데?"

TextEng: "I've got a burned book here. Will that do?"
"Here's a copy of Deekin's book. It's not worth much."
Text: "여기 디킨 책 사본이 있어. 별로 가치 없어."

TextEng: "Quiet, Deekin. The big people are talking now."
"Sorry, Deekin. But we need that shard."
"I don't have time for this."
"Inventory? Are you some kind of merchant?"
"Who are you?"
"Goodbye."
"I don't like your attitude. Time to die!" <StartAction>Attack the merchant.</Start>
Text: "네 태도 마음에 안 들어. 죽을 시간이야!" <StartAction>[상인을 공격한다.]</Start>

TextEng: "I just want to ask you some questions."
"That kind of talk might drive away customers."
